Text.Page:
Do you know what our problem is? No, not argons. Pirates!

The sneaky bastards are stealing our supplies and killing good soldiers. We have to stop this.

The only way to deal with pirates is to think like a pirate. Join a team in Corsairs' Stronghold, and learn how those sea robbers act!

[Corsairs' Stronghold is accessible through the Battleground Matching system.]

Well done!

Great exploits in the battleground earn you Bellicarium credits. Bring those credits to me to purchase your choice of reward items. It's just like pirate's booty!

Don't you feel more like a pirate already?
